text: Abdullah is a well-liked name in the Arabic language that has been used for many years. It's a common name given to boys and has a significant meaning that represents the Islamic religion. The name Abdullah is formed from two Arabic words, "abd" which signifies "servant" and "Allah" which signifies "God". So, the name Abdullah implies "servant of God". == People == * Abdullah Alnefisi, Kuwaiti politician and academic * Abdullah Ã–calan, ideologist, writer and founder of the Kurdistan Workers' Party (PKK) ==References== Category:Names
title: Abdullah
